00024 #ifndef SCPM_TYPES_H
00025 #define SCPM_TYPES_H
00026 
00027 #include <string>
00028 #include <vector>
00029 
00030 
00031 typedef struct resource_info_t {
00032   string resource_name;
00033   string resource_type;
00034   bool   is_new;
00035   bool   is_deleted;
00036   bool   save;
00037 } ;
00038 
00039 typedef struct switch_info_t {
00040   bool profile_modified;
00041   string profile_name;
00042   vector<resource_info_t> modified_resources;
00043 } ;
00044 
00045 typedef struct scpm_status_t {
00046   bool initialized;
00047   bool enabled;
00048   bool db_loaded;
00049   bool db_uptodate;
00050   string active_profile;
00051   string scpm_version;
00052   string db_version;
00053   string db_format;
00054   string db_format_version;
00055 } ;
00056 
00057 extern char *scpm_error;
00058 
00059 const int scpm_flag_force           = 1;
00060 const int scpm_flag_skip            = 2;
00061 const int scpm_flag_quiet           = 4;
00062 const int scpm_flag_verbose         = 8;
00063 const int scpm_flag_hash            = 16;
00064 const int scpm_flag_debug           = 32;
00065 const int scpm_flag_boot            = 64;
00066 const int scpm_flag_exit_on_warning = 128;
00067 const int scpm_flag_skip_load       = 256;
00068 const int scpm_flag_force_db        = 512;
00069 
00070 #endif
